Translations.Text: etaipparri avarkal oruvarukkoruvar kettukkolkinranar
makattana acceytiyaip parri
etaipparri avarkal verupat(ta karuttukkal kon)tirukkirarkalo ataip parri
avvaranru! Avarkal viraivil arintukolvarkal
pinnarum (cantekaminri) avarkal viraivileye arintukolvarkal
nam ippumiyai virippaka akkavillaiya
innum, malaikalai mulaikalaka akkavillaiya
innum unkalai joti jotiyakap pataittom
melum, unkalutaiya tukkattai ilaipparutalaka akkinom
anriyum, iravai unkalukku ataiyaka akkinom
melum, pakalai unkal valkkai (vacatikalait tetikkollum kalam) akkinom
Unkalukkumel palamana eluvanankalai untakkinom
olivicum vilakkai(curiyanai)yum (anku) amaittom
anriyum, karmekankaliliruntu poliyum malaiyaiyum irakkinom
ataik kontu taniyankalaiyum, tavarankalaiyum nam velippatuttuvatarkaka
(kilaikalutan) atarnta colaikalaiyum (velippatuttuvatarkaka)
niccayamakat tirppukkuriya nal, nerankurikkappattatakave irukkiratu
sur (ekkalam) utappatum annalil ninkal ani'aniyaka varuvirkal
innum, vanam tirakkappattu pala vacalkalakivitum
malaikal peyarkkappattu kanal nirakivitum
niccayamaka narakam etirparttuk kontirukkinratu
varampu mirivarkalukkut tankumitamaka
atil avarkal pala yukankalakat tankiyirukkum nilaiyil
avarkal atil kulircciyaiyo, kutippaiyo cuvaikkamattarkal
kotikkum niraiyum cilaiyum tavira
(atutan avarkalukkut) takka kuliyakum
niccayamaka avarkal kelvi kanakkil nampikkai kollamaleye iruntanar
anriyum avarkal nam vacanankalaip poyyenak kuri poyyakkik kontiruntarkal
nam ovvoru porulaiyum pativettil pativu ceytirukkinrom
akave cuvaiyunkal - vetanaiyait tavira veru etanaiyum unkalukku nam atikap patutta mattom" (enru avarkalukkuk kurappatum)
niccayamaka payapaktiyutaiyavarkalukku verrip pakkiyam irukkiratu
tottankalum, tiratcaip palankalum
ore vayatulla kannikalum
panam nirainta kinnankalum, (irukkinrana)
anku avarkal vinanavarraiyum, poyppittalaiyum ketkamattarkal
(itu) um'mutaiya iraivanitamiruntu (alikkap perum) kanakkup patiyana nankotaiyakum
(Avane) vanankalukkum, pumikkum avvirantirkum itaiyeyulla varrirkum iraivan; arrahman - avanitam peca evarum atikaram peramattarkal
ruhu (enra jiprayilu)m, malakkukalum aniyaniyaka nirkum nalil arrahman evarukku anumati kotukirano avarkalait tavirttu verevarum pecamattarkal - a(ttakaiya)varum nermaiyanataiye kuruvar
annal cattiyamanatu. Akave, evar virumpukiraro, avar tam iraivanitam tankumitattai erpatuttik kolvaraka

niccayamaka, nerunki varum vetanaiyaipparri unkalukku eccarikkai ceykirom - manitan tan irukaikalum ceytu murpatuttiyavarrai - amalkalai - annalil kantu kolvan - melum kahpir"anto kaicetame! Nan mannakip poyirukka ventume!" Enru (piralapittuk) kuruvan
(pavikalin uyirkalai) katinamakap parippavar(kalana malakku)kal mitu cattiyamaka
(nallor uyirkalai) ilocakak kalarrupavar(kalana malakku)kal mitum cattiyamaka
vekamaka nintic celpavar(kalana malakku)kal mitum cattiyamaka
munti muntic celpavar(kalana malakku)kal mitum cattiyamaka
ovvoru kariyattaiyum nirvakippavar(kalana malakku)kal mitum cattiyamaka
pumi natukkamaka natunkum annalil
atanait totarum (nila natukkam) totarntu varum
annalil nencankal titukkittavaiyaka irukkum
avarkal parvaikal (accattal) kil nokkiyirukkum
nam niccayamaka kaprukaliliruntu tirumpa (eluppa)p patuvoma?" Enru kurukirarkal
makkip pona elumpukalaka nam akivitta polutiluma
appatiyanal atu perum nasta muntakkum tirumputale yakum" enrum kurukinrarkal
anal (yuka mutivukku), atu niccayamaka ore oru payankara captam tan
Appotu avarkal (uyir perreluntu) oru titalil cekaramay vituvarkal
(napiye!) Musavin ceyti unkalukku vantata
tuva' ennum punita pallattakkil avarutaiya iraivan avarai alaittu
nir hpir'avnitam cellum, niccayamaka avan varampu miri vittan
innum (hpir'avnitam; "pavankalai vittum) paricattamaka ventum enra (viruppam) unnitam irukkirata?" Enru kelum
appatiyanal iraivanitam (cellum) valiyai nan unakkuk kanpikkiren; appotu ni ullaccamutaiyavan avay" (enak kurumaru iraivan panittan)
akave, musa avanukku perum attatciyai kanpittar
anal, avano ataip poyppittu, maru ceytan
piraku avan (avarai vittut) tirumpi (avarukketiray cati ceyya) muyanran
anriyum (avan tan camukattarai) onru tiratti arikkai ceytan
nantan unkalutaiya maperum iraivan - rappukkumul ahla" enru (avarkalitam) kurinan
im'maikkum marumaikkumana tantanaiyaka allah avanai pitittuk kontan
niccayamaka itil iraiyaccam kolvorukku patippinai irukkiratu
unkalaip pataittal katinama? Allatu vanattai (pataittal katinama?) Atai avane pataittan
atan mukattai avan uyartti atai olunku patuttinan
avantan iravai irulutaiyatakkip pakalin oliyaiyum veliyakkinan
itan pinnar, avane pumiyai virittan
atiliruntu atan tanniraiyum, atan mitulla (piranikalukkana) meyccal porulkalaiyum avane veliyakkinan
atil, malaikalaiyum avane nilai nattinan
unkalukkum, unkal kal nataikalukkum palanalippatarkaka (ivvaru ceytullan)
enave (tatuttu nirutta mutiyata marumaip) peramali vantu vittal
Annalil manitan tan muyanravarraiyellam ninaivupatuttik kolvan
appotu parpporukku(k kanum vakaiyil) narakam velippatuttappatum
enave, evan varampai mirinano
inta ulaka valkkaiyait terntetuttano
avanukku, niccayamaka narakantan tankumitamakum
evan tan iraivan mun nirpatai anci manataiyum iccaikalai vittu vilakkik kontano
niccayamaka avanukkuc cuvarkkamtan tankumitamakum
(napiye! "Marumaiyin) nerattaip parri - atu eppotu erpatum?" Enru avarkal um'maik ketkirarkal
a(nnerat)taip parri nir kurippituvatarku enna irukkiratu
atan mutivellam um'mutaiya iraivanitam (allava) irukkiratu
atai payappatuvorukku, niccayamaka nir eccarikkai ceypavar tam
niccayamaka atai avarkal kanum nalil, malaiyilo, allatu kalaiyilo oru corpa nerameyanri, avarkal (ivvulakil) tankiyirukkavillai enru tonrum
avar katukatuttar, melum (mukattait) tiruppik kontar
avaritam anta antakar vantapotu
(napiye! Um'mitam vanta avar) avar tuymaiyaki vitakkutum enpatai nir arivira
allatu avar (um upatecattai) ninaivu patuttikkolvatan mulam, (um'mutaiya) upatecam avarukkup palanalittirukkalam
(um upatecattin) tevaiyai evan alatciyam ceykirano
nir avanpale munnokkukinrir
ayinum (islattai yerru) avan tuymaiyataiyamal ponal, um mitu (atanal kurram) illai
anal, evar um'mitam viraintu vantaro
allahvukku anciyavaraka
avarai vittum paramukamay irukkinrir
avvaralla! Enenil (ittiruk kur'an ninaivuttum) nallupatecamakum
enave, evar virumpukiraro avar atai ninaivu kolvar
(Atu) cankaiyakkappatta etukalil irukkiratu
uyarvakkappattatu, paricuttamakkappattatu
(vanavarkalana) elutupavarkalin kaikalal
(lavhul mahhpuliliruntu elutiya avvanavarkal) cankai mikkavarkal; nallorkal
(nanri ketta manitan) alivanaka! Evvalavu nanri marantavanaka avan irukkinran
epporulal avanai (allah) pataittan? (Enpatai avan cintittana)
(oru tuli) intiriyattiliruntu avanaip pataittu, avanai (alavuppati) cariyakkinan
pin avanukkaka valiyai elitakkinan
pin avanai marikkac ceytu, avanai kapril' akkukiran
pinnar, avan virumpumpotu avanai (uyirppittu) eluppuvan
(ivvariruntum allah manitanukku) etai evinano atai avan niraiverruvatillai
enave, manitan tan unavin pakkame (atu evvaru perappatukiratu) enpatai nottamittup parkkattum
niccayamaka name malaiyai nanku poliyac ceykirom
pin, pumiyaip pilappatakap pilantu
pin atiliruntu vittai mulaippikkirom
tiratcaikalaiyum, purpuntukalaiyum
oliva marattaiyum, periccaiyaiyum
atarnta tottankalaiyum
palankalaiyum, tivanankalaiyum
(ivaiyellam) unkalukkum, unkal kal nataikalukkum payanalippatarkaka
akave, (yuka mutivin potu kataic cevitakkum perun captam varum potu)
anta nalil manitan virantu otuvan - tan cakotaranai vittum
tan tayai vittum, tan tantaiyai vittum
tan manaiviyai vittum, tan makkalai vittum
anru ovvoru manitanukkum avanavan (avala) nilaiye potumanatayirukkum
annalil cila mukankal ilankik kontirukkum
cirittavaiyakavum, makilvutaiyatakavum irukkum
Anal annalil - (veru) cila mukankal, avarrin mitu puluti patintirukkum
avarraik karumai irul mutiyirukkum
avarkaltam, nirakarittavarkala,; tiyavarkal
curiyan (oliyillatatakac) curuttappatum potu
natcattirankal (oliyilantu) utirntu vilumpotu
malaikal peyarkkappatum potu
cul nirainta ottakaikal (kavanippararru) vitappatum potu
kattu mirukankal (manitarkalutanum, itara piranikalutanum) onru cerkkappatumpotu
katalkal ti muttappatumpotu
uyirkal onrinaikkappatum potu
uyirutan putaikkappatta pen (kulantai) vinavappatum potu
entak kurrattirkaka atu kollappattatu?" Enru
pattolaikal virikkappatum potu
vanam akarrappatum potu
narakam koluntuvittu eriyumaru ceyyappatum potu
cuvarkkam camipamaka kontu varappatumpotu
ovvor atmavum, tan kontu vantatai arintu kollum
enave, pinne vilakic celpavai (kirakankalin) mitu cattiyamaka
mun cenru kontiruppavai maraipavai (mitum)
pinvankic cellum iravin mitum
muccuvittuk kontelum vaikaraiyin mitum cattiyamaka
niccayamaka (ikkur'an) mikavum kanniyamikka oru tutuvar (jiprayil mulam vanta) collakum
(avar) caktimikkavar; arsukkutaiyavanitam perum pataviyutaiyavar
(vanavar tam) talaivar; anriyum nampikkaikkuriyavar
melum unkal tolar paittiyakkarar allar
avar tittamaka avarai (jiprayilai) telivana ativanattil kantar
melum, avar maraivana ceytikalai kuruvatil ulopittanam ceypavarallar
anriyum, itu virattappatta saittanin vakkalla
enave, (nervaliyai vittum) ninkal enke celkinrirkal
itu, akilattarukkellam upatecamakum
Unkalil ninrum yar nervaliyai virumpukiraro, avarukku (nallupatecamakum)
ayinum, akilankalukkellam iraivanakiya allah natinalanri ninkal (nallupatecam pera) natamattirkal
vanam pilantu vitumpotu
natcattirankal utirntu vilumpotu
katalkal (ponki onral onru) akarrappatum potu
kaprukal tirakkappatum potu
ovvor atmavum, atu etai murpatutti (anuppi) vaittatu, etaip pinne vittuc cenratu enpatai arintu kollum
manitane! Kotaiyalanana cankai mikka un iraivanukku maru ceyyumpati unnai marutti vittatu etu
avantan unnaippataittu, unnai olunkupatutti; unnaic cevvaiyakkinan
enta vativattil avan virumpinano (atil un uruppukalaip) poruttinan
ivvariruntum ninkal (kiyama) nalaip poyppikkinrirkal
niccayamaka, unkal mitu patu kavalarkal (niyamikkappattu) irukkinranar
(avarkal) kanniyam vaynta eluttalarkal
ninkal ceykiratai avarkal arikirarkal
niccayamaka nallavarkal nayim ennum cuvarkkattil irupparkal
innum, niccayamaka, timai ceytavarkal narakattil irupparkal
niyayattirppu nalil avarkal atil piravecipparkal
melum, avarkal atiliruntu (tappittu) maraintu vita mattarkal
niyayat tirppu nal enna venru umakku arivippatu etu
pinnum - niyayat tirppu nal enna enru umakku arivippatu etu
annalil or atma piritor atmavukku etuvum ceyya cakti peratu, atikaram muluvatum anru allahvukke
alavu (etaiyil) mocam ceypavarkalukku ketutan
avarkal manitarkalitamiruntu alantu vankum potu niraivaka alantu vankukinranar
Anal, avarkal alanto, nirutto kotukkumpotu kurai(ttu nastamunta)kkukirarkal
niccayamaka avarkal eluppappatupavarkalenpatai avarkal karuttil kollavillaiya
makattana oru nalukkaka
akilattarin iraivan mun manitarkal nirkum nal
akave, niccayamaka tiyorkalin pativetu sijjinil irukkiratu
sijjin' enpatu ennavenru umakku etu arivikkum
atu (ceyalkal) elutappatta etakum
poyppippavarkalukku annalil ketutan
avarkal niyayat tirppu nalaiyum poyppikkirarkal
varampu miriya, perum paviyait tavira verevarum ataip poyppikka mattar
nam'mutaiya vacanankal avanukku otik kanpikkappattal, "avai munnorkalin kattuk kataikale" enru kurukinran
appatiyalla: Avarkal campatittuk kontiruntavai avarkalutaiya irutayankal mitu turuvakap patintu vittana
(tirppukkuriya) annalil avarkal tankal iraivanai vittum tiraiyitappattavarkalavarkal
pinnar niccayamaka avarkal narakil pukuvarkal
etai ninkal poyppittuk kontu iruntirkalo, atutan itu" enru pin avarkalukkuc collappatum
niccayamaka nallorkalin pativetum"illiyyi"nil irukkiratu
illiyyun' enpatu ennavenru umakku etu arivikkum
(atu) ceyalkal elutappatta etakum
(allahvitam) nerunkiya (kanniyam mikka vana)varkal atai parpparkal
niccayamaka aprarkal (nallavarkal)'nayim' ennum cuvarkkattil irupparkal
acanankalil amarntu (cuvarkkak katcikalaip) parpparkal
avarkalutaiya mukankalilirunte (avarkalukkuk kittiya) pakkiyattin celumaiyai nir arivir
(Paricutta) muttiraiyitappatta telivana (potaiyo, kalankamo arra) matuviliruntu avarkal pukattappatuvarkal
atan muttirai kasturiyakum, enave (atarkaka) arvam kolpavarkal, (ataip perruk kolvatarkana nalla amalkalil) arvam kollattum
innum, atanutaiya kalavai tasnimil ninrullatakum
atu (tasnim, or iniya) nirccunaiyakum. Atiliruntu (allahvitam nerunkiyavarkal) mukarrapukal aruntuvarkal
niccayamaka, kurramilaittarkale avarkal, iman kontavarkalaip parttu (ulakil) cirittuk kontiruntarkal
anriyum, avarkal anmaiyil cenral, (elanamaka) oruvarukkoruvar kancatai ceytukolvarkal
innum avarkal tam kutumpattarpal tirumpic cenralum, (tankal ceytatu parri) makilvutaneye tirumpic celvarkal
melum avarkal (muhminkalaip) parttal, "niccamayaka ivarkale vali tavariyavarkal" enrum kuruvarkal
(muhminkalin mitu) avarkal patukavalarkalaka anuppappatavillaiye
anal (marumai) nalil iman kontavarkal kahpirkalaip parttu ciripparkal
acanankalil amarntu (avarkal nilaiyaip) parpparkal
kahpirkalukku, avarkal ceytu kontiruntavarrukku takka kuli kotukkappattata? (Enrum ketkappatum)
vanam pilantuvitum potu
tanatu (iraivanin anaikku kattuppatuvatu) katamaiyakkappattulla nilaiyil tan iraivanin kattalaikku (anta vanam) atipaniyum potu
innum, pumi virikkappattu
atu, tannilullavarrai veliyakki, atu kaliyaki vitum potu
tanatu (iraivanin anaikku kattuppatuvatu) katamaiyakkappattulla nilaiyil tan iraivanin kattalaikku (anta pumi) atipaniyumpotu
Manitane! Niccayamaka ni un iraivanitam cerum varai munaintu ulaippavanaka ulaikkinray - pinnar avanaic cantippavanaka irukkinray
akave evanutaiya pattolai avanutaiya valakkaiyil kotukkappatukinrato
avan culapamana vicaranaiyaka vicarikkappatuvan
innum, tannaic carntoritamum makilvutan tirumpuvan
anal, evanutaiya pattolai avanutaiya mutukukkup pinnal kotukkappatukinrato
avan (tankuk)'ketu' tan enak kuviyavanaka
avan narakattil pukuvan
niccayamaka avan (im'maiyil) tannaic carntorutan makilvotu iruntan
niccayamaka, tan (iraivan pal)"milave matten" enru enniyiruntan
appatiyalla, niccayamaka avanutaiya iraivan avanaik kavanittu nokkukiravanakave iruntan
innum, antic cevvanattin mitu nan cattiyam ceykinren
melum, iravin mitum, atu onru cerppavarrin mitum
purana cantiran mitum (cattiyam ceykinren)
ninkal oru nilaiyiliruntu marroru nilaikku niccayamaka erippovirkal
enave, avarkalukku enna (nerntatu?) Avarkal iman kolvatillai
melum, avarkalitattil kur'an otik kanpikkappattal, avarkal sujutu ceyvatillai
anriyum nirakarippavarkal ataip poyppikkinranar
anal allah, avarkal (tankalukkulle cekarittu) maraittu vaittiruppavarrai nanku arintirukkinran
(napiye!) Avarkalukku novinai ceyyum vetanaiyaik kontu nanmarayan kuruviraka
evarkal imankontu, salihana (nalla) amalkal ceykirarkalo avarkalait tavira - avarkalukku mutiveyillata narkuli untu
kirakankalutaiya vanattin mitu cattiyamaka
innum, vakkalikkappatta (iruti) nal mitum cattiyamaka
Melum, catcikal mitum, catci collappatuvatan mitum cattiyamaka
(neruppuk) kuntankalaiyutaiyavarkal kollappattanar
virakukal pottu eritta perum neruppuk (kuntam)
avarkal atanpal utkarntirunta potu
muhminkalai avarkal (neruppuk kuntattil pottu vetanai) ceytatarku avarkale catcikalaka iruntanar
(yavaraiyum) mikaittavanum, pukalutaiyonumakiya allahvin mitu avarkal iman kontarkal enpatarkaka anri veretarkum avarkalaip pali vankavillai
vanankal, pumiyin atci avanukke uriyatu, enave allah anaittup porulkal mitum catciyaka irukkiran
niccayamaka, evarkal muhminana ankalaiyum, muhminana penkalaiyum tunpuruttip pinnar, tavpa ceyyavillaiyo avarkalukku naraka vetanai untu melum, karittup pocukkum vetanaiyum avarkalukku untu
anal evarkal iman kontu, salihana (nalla) amalkal ceykirarkalo, avarkalukkuc cuvarkkac colaikal untu, avarrin kil natikal otik kontirukkum - atuve maperum pakkiyamakum
niccayamaka, um'mutaiya iraivanin piti mikavum katinamanatu
niccayamaka, avane atiyil urpatti ceytan, melum (maranattarkup pinnum) mila vaikkiran
anriyum, avan mikavum mannippavan; mikka anputaiyavan
(avane) arsukkutaiyavan peruntanmai mikkavan
tan virumpiyavarraic ceykiravan
(napiye!) Antap pataikalin ceyti umakku vantata
hpir'avnutaiyavum, samututaiyavum
eninum, nirakarippavarkal poyppippatileye irukkinranar
anal, allahvo avarkalai murrilum culntirukkiran
(nirakarippor evvalavu muyanralum) itu perumai poruntiya kur'anaka irukkum
(Evvita marrattukkum itamillamal) lavhul mahhpulil - pativaki patu kakkappattataka irukkiratu
vanattin mitu cattiyamaka! Tarik mitum cattiyamaka
tarik ennavenru umakku arivittatu etu
atu ilankum oru natcattiram
ovvoru atmavukku oru patukavalar illamalillai
manitan etiliruntu pataikkappattan enpatai kavanikkattum
kutittu velippatum (oru tuli) nirinal pataikkappattan
mutukan tantirkum, vila elumpukalukkum itaiyiliruntu atu veliyakiratu
iraivan (manitan iranta pin avanai uyirppittu) mittum caktiyutaiyavan
irakaciyankal yavum velippattuvitum annalil
manitanukku enta palamum iratu, (avanukku) utavi ceypavanum illai
(tirumpat tirumpap) poliyum malaiyai utaiya vanattin mitu cattiyamaka
(tavarankal mulaippatarkup) pilavu patum pumiyin mitum cattiyamaka
niccayamaka itu (kur'an cattiyattaiyum, acattiyattaiyum) pirittu arivikkakkutiya vakkakum
anriyum, itu vinana (varttaikalaik konta)tu alla
niccayamaka avarkal (umakketirakac) culcci ceykirarkal
nanum (avarkalukketirakac) culcci ceykiren
enave, kahpirkalukku nir avakacamalippiraka, corpamaka avakacam alippiraka
(napiye!) Mikka melanavanana um'mutaiya iraivanin tirunamattai(t tiyanittu) taspihu ceyviraka
avane (yavarraiyum) pataittuc cevvaiyakkinan
melum, avane (avarrukku ventiya anaittaiyum) alavupata nirnayittu (avarraip peruvatarku) nervali kattinan
anriyum avane (kal nataikalukkena) meyccalukkuriyavarraiyum veliyakkinan
pinnar avarrai ularnta kulankalaka akkinan
(Napiye!) Nam umakku otakkarruk kotuppom; atanal nir atai marakkamattir
allah natiyatai allamal - niccayamaka, avan velippataiyanataiyum maraintiruppataiyum arikiran
anriyum, ilecana (markkat)tai nam umakku elitakkuvom
akave, nallupatecam payanalikkumayin, nir upatecam ceyviraka
(allahvukku) ancupavan viraivil upatecattai erpan
anal turpakkiyamutaiyavano, atai vittu vilakik kolvan
avan tan perum neruppil pukuvan
pinnar, atil avan marikkavum mattan; valavum mattan
tuymaiyataintavan, tittamaka verri perukiran
melum, avan tan iraivanutaiya namattait tutittuk kontum, tolutu kontum iruppan
eninum, ninkalo (marumaiyai vittu vittu) ivvulaka valvait terntetuttuk kolkirirkal
anal marumai (valkkai)yo cirantatakum; enrum nilaittiruppatum akum
nicyacamaka itu muntiya akamankalilum
iprahim, musavinutaiya akamankalilum (ivvare arivippu) irukkiratu
culantu mutikkolvatin (kiyama nalin) ceyti umakku vantata
annalil cila mukankal ilivupattirukkum
avai (tavarana kariyankalai nallavai ena karuti) ceyalpattavaiyum (atileye) urutiyaka ninravaiyumakum
koluntu vitteriyum neruppil avai pukum
kotikkum urriliruntu, (avarkalukku) nir pukattappatum
avarkalukku visac cetikalait tavira, veru unavillai
atu avarkalaik kolu(ttuc celi)kkavum vaikkatu, anriyum paciyaiyum tanikkatu
annalil cila mukankal celumaiyaka irukkum
tam muyarci (narpayan ataintatu) parri tiruptiyutan irukkum
unnatamana cuvarkkac colaiyil
atil yatoru payanarra collaiyum avai ceviyuruvatillai
Atil otik kontirukkum nirurru untu
atil uyarnta acanankal untu
(aruntak) kuvalaikalum vaikkap pattirukkum
melum, ani aniyakkappattulla tintukalum
virikkappatta uyarnta kampalankalum untu
(napiye!) Ottakattai avarkal kavanikka ventama? Atu evvaru pataikkappattirukkiratu enru
melum vanattai atu evvaru uyarttappattirukkiratu? Enrum
innum malaikalaiyum avai eppati nattappattirukkinrana? Enrum
innum pumi atu eppati virikkappattirukkiratu? (Enrum avarkal kavanikka ventama)
akave, (napiye! Ivarraik kontu) nir nallupatecam ceyviraka, niccayamaka nir nallupatecam ceypavar tam
avarkal mitu poruppuc cattappattavar allar
ayinum, evan (cattiyattaip) purakkanittu, melum nirakarikkinrano
avanai allah mikap perum vetanaiyaik kontu vetanaippatuttuvan
niccayamaka, nam'mitame avarkalutaiya milutal irukkiratu
pinnar, niccayamaka nam'mitame avarkalaik kelvi kanakku ketpatum irukkiratu
vitiyar kalaiyin mitu cattiyamaka
pattu iravukalin mitu cattiyamaka
irattaiyin mitum, orraiyin mitum cattiyamaka
celkinra iravin mitum, cattiyamaka
itil arivutaiyorukku (potumana) cattiyam irukkiratallava
um'mutaiya iraivan a(tu kuttat)tai enna ceytan enpatai nir parkkavillaiya
(avarkal) tunkalaiyutaiya'iram' (nakara) vacikal
avarkal ponra oru camutayam enta natukalilum pataikkappatavillai
pallattakkukalil paraikalaik kutain(tu vacittu van)ta samutu kuttattaiyum (enna ceytan enru parkkavillaiya)
melum, perum pataikalaik konta hpir'avnaiyum (um iraivan enna ceytan enpatai nir parkkavillaiya)
Avarkalellam natukalil varampu miri natantanar
anriyum, avarril kulappattai atikappatuttinar
enave, um'mutaiya iraivan avarkal mel vetanaiyin cattaiyai erintan
niccayamaka, um'mutaiya iraivan kankanittuk kontu irukkiranran
anal, iraivan manitanukku kanniyappatutti, pakkiyam alittu avanaic cotikkum potu avan; "en iraivan ennai kanniyappatuttiyullan" enru kurukiran
eninum avanutaiya unavu vacatikalaik kuraittu, avanai (iraivan) cotittalo, avan, "en iraivan ennaic cirumaip patutti vittan" enak kurukinran
appatiyalla! Ninkal anataiyaik kanniyappatuttuvatu illai
elaikku unavalikkumaru tuntuvatillai
innum (pirarutaiya) anantarac cottukkalaiyum (certtu) untu varukinrirkal
innum, porulai alavu katantu piriyattutan necikkinrirkal
appatiyalla! Pumi tul tulakat takarkkappatum potu
um'mutaiya iraivanum, vanavarum aniyaniyaka varumpotu
annalil narakam mun kontu varappatum potu - annalil manitan unarvu peruvan; anta (nalil) unarvu (peruvatinal) avanukku enna palan
en (marumai) valkkaikkaka nanmaiyai nan murpatutti (anuppi)yirukka ventume!" Enru appotu manitan kuruvan
anal annalil (allah ceyyum) vetanaiyaip pol, veru evanum vetanai ceyyamattan
melum, avan kattuvatu pol veru evanum kattamattan
(anal, annalil nallatiyarkalitam) cantiyatainta atmave
ni unnutaiya iraivanpal tirupti atainta nilaiyilum, (avan) unmitu tiruptiyatainta nilaiyilum miluvayaka
ni en nallatiyarkalil cerntu kolvayaka
melum, ni en cuvarkkattil piravecippayaka (enru iraivan kuruvan)
Innakarattin mitu nan cattiyam ceykinren
nir innakarattil (cutantiramakat) tankiyirukkum nilaiyil
perror mitum, (perra) cantatiyin mitum cattiyamaka
titamaka, nam manitanaik kastattil (ullavanakap) pataittom
oruvarum, tan mitu cakti perave mattar' enru avan ennik kolkirana
eralamana porulai nan alitten" enru avan kurukiran
tannai oruvarum parkkavillaiyenru avan ennukirana
avanukku nam irantu kankalai nam akkavillaiya
melum navaiyum, irantu utatukalaiyum (akkavillaiya)
anriyum (nanmai, timaiyakiya) irupataikalai nam avanukkuk kanpittom
ayinum, avan kanavayaik katakkavillai
(napiye!) Kanavay enpatu enna enpatai umakku etu arivikkum
(atu) or atimaiyai vituvittal
allatu, pacittirukkum nalil unavalittalakum
uravinanana or anataikko
allatu (varumai) mannil puralum or elaikko (unavalippatakum)
pinnar, iman kontu, porumaiyaik kontu oruvarukkoruvar upatecittum, kirupaiyaik kontu oruvaruk koruvar upatecittum vantavarkalil iruppatuvum (kanavayaik katattal) akum
attakaiyavar tam valappurattil iruppavarkal
anal, evarkal nam vacanankalai nirakarikkirarkalo, avarkal tam itappakkattaiyutaiyor
avarkal mitu (eppakkamum) mutappatta neruppu irukkiratu
curiyan mitum, atan pirakacattin mitum cattiyamaka
(pin) atanait totarntu varum cantiran mitum cattiyamaka
(curiyanal) pakal veliyakumpotu, atan mitum cattiyamaka
(appakalai) mutikkollum iravin mitum cattiyamaka
vanattin mitum, atai(olunkura) amaintiruppatin mitum cattiyamaka
Pumiyin mitum, innum atai virittatin mitum cattiyamaka
atmavin mitum, atai olunkupatuttiyavan mitum cattiyamaka
appal, avan (allah) atarku atan timaiyaiyum, atan nanmaiyaiyum unarttinan
atai (atmavai)p paricuttamakkiyavar titamaka verriyataintar
anal evan atai(p pavattil) pukuttinano avan tittamakat tolvi ataintan
samutu' (kuttattinar) tankal akkiramattinal (salih napiyaip) poyppittanar
avarkalil ketuketta oruvan viraintu mun vantapotu
allahvin tutar (salih) avarkalai nokki: "Ip pen ottakam allahvutaiyatu, itu tannir arunta(t tatai ceyyatu) vittu vitunkal" enru kurinar

anal, avarkal avaraip poyppittu, atan kal narampait tarittu vittanar - akave, avarkalin intap pavattin karanamaka avarkalutaiya iraivan avarkal mitu vetanaiyai irakki, avarkal yavaraiyum (alittuc) cariyakki vittan
atan mutivaip parri avan payappatavillai
(irulal) tannai mutikkollum iravin mitu cattiyamaka
pirakacam velippatum pakalin mitum cattiyamaka
anaiyum, pennaiyum (avan) pataittiruppatin mitum cattiyamaka
niccayamaka unkalutaiya muyarci palavakum
enave evar (tanatarumam) kotuttu, (tan iraivanitam) payapaktiyutan natantu
nallavarrai (avai nallavaiyenru) unmaiyakkukinraro
avarukku nam (cuvarkkattin valiyai) ilecakkuvom
anal evan ulopittanam ceytu allahvitamiruntu tannait tevaiyarravanakak karutukirano
innum, nallavarrai poyyakkukirano
avanukku kastattirkulla (narakattin) valiyait tan ilecakkuvom
akave avan (narakattil) viluntu vittal avanutaiya porul avanukkup palan alikkatu
Ner valiyaik kanpittal niccayamaka nam mitu irukkiratu
anriyum pintiyatum (marumaiyum) muntiyatum (im'maiyum) nam'mutaiyavaiye akum
atalin, koluntuvitteriyum (naraka) neruppaipparri nan unkalai accamutti eccarikkiren
mikka turppakkiyamullavanait tavira (veru) evanum atil pukamattan
ettakaiyavanenral avan (nam vacanankalaip) poyyakki, mukam tirumpinan
anal payapaktiyutaiyavar tam a(nnarakat)tiliruntu tolaivilakkappatuvar
(avar ettakaiyorenral) tam'mai tuymaip patuttiyavarakat tam porulai (iraivan pataiyil) kotukkirar
melum, tam patil (itu) ceyyumaru pirarutaiya upakaramum tam mitu illatiruntum
maka melana tam iraivanin tirupporuttattai natiye (avar tanam kotukkirar)
veku viraivileye (attakaiyavar allahvin arul kotaiyal) tirupti peruvar
murpakal mitu cattiyamaka
otunkik kollum iravin mitu cattiyamaka
um'mutaiya iraivan um'maik kai vitavumillai; avan (um'mai) verukkavumillai
melum pintiyatu (marumai) muntiyatai (im'maiyai) vita umakku melanatakum
innum, um'mutaiya iraivan veku cikkiram umakku (uyar patavikalaik) kotuppan; appolutu nir tiruptiyataivir
(napiye!) Avan um'mai anataiyakak kantu, appal (umakkup) pukalitamalikkavillaiya
innum, um'mai valiyarravarakak kantu avan, (um'mai) nervaliyil celuttinan
melum, avan um'mait tevaiyutaiyavarakakkantu, (um'maic celvattal) tevaiyillatavarakkinan
enave, nir anataiyaik katintu kollatir
yacipporai virattatir
melum, um'mutaiya iraivanin arutkotaiyaip parri (pirarukku) arivittuk kontiruppiraka
Nam, um itayattai umakkaka virivakkavillaiya
melum, nam um'mai vittum um cumaiyai irakkinom
atu um mutukai murittuk kontutiruntatu
melum, nam umakkaka um'mutaiya pukalai melonkac ceytom
atalin niccayamakat tunpattutan inpam irukkiratu
niccayamaka tunpattutan inpam irukkiratu
enave, (velaikaliliruntu) nir oyntatum (iraivaliyilum, vanakkattilum) muyalviraka
melum, mulu manattutan um iraivan pal carntu vituviraka
attiyin mitum, olivattin (jaittun) mitum cattiyamaka
sinay' malaiyin mitum cattiyamaka
melum apayamalikkum inta (makkama) nakarattin mitum cattiyamaka
titamaka, nam manitanai mikavum alakiya amaippil pataittom
pinnar (avan ceyalkalin karanamaka) avanait talntavarkalil, mikka talntavanakkinom
evarkal iman kontu salihana (nalla) amalkal ceykirarkalo avarkalait tavira - (nallavarkalana) avarkalukku enrum mutivillata narkuliyuntu
enave (itarkup) pinnar, niyayat tirppu nalaipparri um'mitam etu poyyakka mutiyum
allah tirppuc ceyvoril ellam mika melakat tirppuc ceypavanillaiya
(yavarraiyum) pataitta um'mutaiya iraivanin tirunamattaik kontu otuviraka
alak' enra nilaiyiliruntu manitanai pataittan
otuviraka: Um iraivan maperum kotaiyali
avane elutu kolaik kontu karruk kotuttan
manitanukku avan ariyatavarraiyellam karruk kotuttan
eninum niccayamaka manitan varampu mirukiran
avan tannai (iraivanitamiruntu) tevaiyarravan enru kanum potu
niccayamaka avan milutal um'mutaiya iraivanpale irukkiratu
tatai ceykirane (avanai) nir parttira
or atiyarai - avar tolumpotu
Nir parttira? Avar nervaliyil iruntu kontum
allatu avar payapaktiyaik kontu eviyavaru iruntum
avarai avan poyyakki, mukattait tiruppik kontan enpatai nir parttira
niccayamaka allah (avanaip) parkkiran enpatai avan ariyavillaiya
appatiyalla: Avan vilakik kollavillaiyanal, niccayamaka nam (avanutaiya) munnerri romattaip pitittu avanai iluppom
tavarilaittu poyyuraikkum munnerri romattai
akave, avan tan capaiyorai alaikkattum
namum narakak kavalalikalai alaippom
(avan kuruvatu polalla) avanukku nir valipatatir; (um iraivanukku) sujutu ceytu (vananki avanai) nerunkuviraka
niccayamaka nam atai (kur'anai) kanniyamikka (lailattul katr) enra iravil irakkinom
melum kanniyamikka iravu enna enpatai umakku arivittatu etu
kanniyamikka (anta) iravu ayiram matankalai vita mika melanatakum
atil malakkukalum, anmavum (jiprayilum) tam iraivanin kattalaiyin pati (nataipera ventiya) cakala kariyankalutan irankukinranar
canti (nilaviyirukkum) atu vitiyarkalai utayamakum varai irukkum
vetakkararkalilum, musrikkukalilum evarkal nirakarikkinrarkalo, avarkal tankalitam telivana ataram varum varai (tam valikaliliruntu) vilakupavarkal allar
(at telivana ataram) allahvitamiruntu vanta tutar, avarkalukku paricuttamana akamankalai otik kanpikkirar (enpatu)
avarril nilaiyana cattatittankal varaiyappattullana
eninum vetakkararkal avarkalukkut telivana (inta) ataram vanta pinnareyanri avarkal pilavupatavillai

Allahvukku vanakkattai tuymaiyakkiyavarkalaka (tavarana valiyiliruntu vilaki cariyana valiyil) pitippullavarkalaka allahvai avarkal vananka ventum, melum tolukaiyai avarkal nilainattaventum, melum jakattai avarkal valanka ventum enpatait tavira (veretuvum) avarkalukkuk kattalaiyitappatavillai. Itutan nerana markkamakum
niccayamaka vetakkararkalilum musrikkukalilum evarkal nirakarikkirarkalo avarkal naraka neruppil irupparkal - atil enrenrum irupparkal - ittakaiyavarkaltam pataippukalil mikak kettavarkal avarkal
niccayamaka, evarkal iman kontu, salihana (nalla) amalkal ceykirarkalo, avarkal tam pataippukalil mika melanavarkal avarkal

avarkalutaiya narkuli, avarkalutaiya iraivanitattilulla atnu ennum cuvarkkac colaikalakum. Avarrin kile arukal otikkontu irukkum; avarril avarkal enrenrum tankiyirupparkal; allahvum avarkalaip parri, tirupti ataivan, avarkalum avanaipparri tirupti ataivarkal; tan iraivanukkup payappatukirare attakaiyavarukke inta melana nilai untakum
pumi perum atircciyaka - atircci ataiyum potu
innum, pumi tan cumaikalai velippatuttum potu
atarku enna nerntatu?" Enru manitan ketkum potu
annalil, atu tan ceytikalai arivikkum
(avvaru arivikkumaru) um'mutaiya iraivan atarku vahi mulam arittatanal
annalil, makkal tankal vinaikal kanpikkappatum poruttu, pala pirivinarkalakap pirintu varuvarkal
enave, evar or anuvalavu nanmai ceytiruntalum ata(rkuriya pala)nai avar kantu kolvar
Anriyum, evan or anuvalavu timai ceytiruntalum, a(tarkuriya pala)naiyum avan kantu kolvan
muccuttinara viraintu otupavarrin (kutiraikal) mitu cattiyamaka
pinnar, (kulampai) atittu neruppup parakkac ceypavarrin mitum
pinnar, atikalaiyil viraintu (etirikal mitu) payntu celpavarrin mitum
melum, atanal pulutiyaik kilappukinravarrin mitum
appal (pakaippataiyin) mattiyil kuttamaka nulaintu celpavarrin mitum cattiyamaka
niccayamaka, manitan tan iraivanukku nanri kettavanaka irukkinran
anriyum, niccayamaka avane itarkuc catciyakavum irukkinran
innum, niccayamaka avan porulai necippatil alavu katante irukkinran
avan arintu kollavillaiya? Kaprukaliliruntu, avarriliruppavai eluppappatum potu
melum, itayankalil ullavai veliyakkappatum potu
niccayamaka, avarkalutaiya iraivan avarkalaipparri, annalil nankarintavan
titukkitac ceyyum (nikalcci)
titukkitac ceyyum (nikalcci) enna
titukkitac ceyyum (nikalcci) enna venru umakku etu arivittatu
annalil citaratikkappatta icalkalaip ponru manitarkal akivituvarkal
melum, malaikal kottappatta pancaip ponru akivitum
enave, (annalil) evarutaiya (nanmaiyin) nirai kanattato
avar tirupti poruntiya valvil iruppar
anal evanutaiya (nanmaiyin) nirai ilecaka irukkirato
avan tankumitam"haviya" tan
innum ('haviya') enna enru umakku arivittatu etu
atu cutterikkum (narakattin) tikkitankakum
celvattaip perukkum acai unkalai (allahvai vittum) parakkakki vittatu
ninkal kaprukalaic cantikkum varai
Avvarillai, viraivil (atan palanai) ninkal arintu kolvirkal
pinnar avvaralla, viraivil (atan palanai) ninkal arintu kolvirkal
avvaralla - meyyana arivaik kontarintiruppirkalanal (anta acai unkalaip parakkakkatu)
niccayamaka (avvacaiyal) ninkal narakattaip parppirkal
pinnum, ninkal atai urutiyakak kannal parppirkal
pinnar annalil (im'maiyil unkalukku alikkappattirunta) arut kotaikalaip parri niccayamaka ninkal ketkappatuvirkal
kalattin mitu cattiyamaka
niccayamaka manitan nastattil irukkinran

ayinum, evarkal iman kontu salihana (nalla) amalkal ceytu, cattiyattaik kontu oruvarukkoruvar upatecam ceytu, melum porumaiyaik kontum oruvarukkoruvar upatecikkirarkalo avarkalait tavira (avarkal nastattilillai)
kurai collip puram pecit tiriyum ovvoruvanukkum ketutan
(attakaiyavan celvame cacuvatamena ennip) porulaic cekarittu ennik konte irukkinran
niccayamakat, tan porul tannai (ulakil nittiyanaka) enrum nilaittirukkac ceyyumenru avan ennukiran
appatiyalla, niccayamaka avan hutamavil eriyappatuvan
hutama enna enpatai umakku arivittatu etu
atu erintu kontirukkum allahvin neruppakum
atu (utalil pattatum) irutayankalil payum
niccayamaka atu avarkalaic culntu muttappatum
ninta kampankalil (avarkal kattappattavarkalaka)
(napiye!) Yanai(p patai)k kararkalai um iraivan enna ceytan enpatai nir parkkavillaiya
avarkalutaiya culcciyai avan palakki vitavillaiya
melum, avarkal mitu paravaikalaik kuttan kuttamaka avan anuppinan
Cutappatta ciru karkalai avarkal mitu avai erintana
atanal, avarkalai menru tinnappatta vaikkolaip pol avan akki vittan
kuraisikalukku viruppam untakki
mari kalattutaiyavum kotaikkalattutaiyavum pirayanattil avarkalukku mana viruppattai untakkiyamaikkaka
ivvittin (ka'apavin) iraivanai avarkal vanankuvarkalaka
avane, avarkalukku pacikku unavalittan; melum avarkalukku accattiliruntum apayamalittan
(napiye!) Niyayattirppaip poyppikkinrane avanai nir parttira
pinnar avantan anataikalai virattukiran
melum, elaikku unavalippatin perilum avan tuntuvatillai
innum, (kavanamarra) tolukaiyalikalukkuk ketutan
avarkal ettakaiyor enral tam tolukaiyil paramukamaka(vum, acirattaiyaka)vum iruppor
avarkal pirarukkuk kanpik(kave tan tolu)kirarkal
melum, arpamana (pulankum) porulkalaik (kotuppatai vittum) tatukkirarkal
(napiye!) Niccayamaka nam umakku kavsar (enra tatakattai) kotuttirukkinrom
enave, um iraivanukku nir tolutu, kurpaniyum kotuppiraka
niccayamaka um'mutaiya pakaivan (evano) avantan cantatiyarravan
(napiye!) Nir colviraka: "Kahpirkale
ninkal vanankupavarrai nan vanankamatten
innum, nan vanankukiravanai ninkal vanankukiravarkalallar
anriyum, ninkal vanankupavarrai nan vanankupavanallan
melum, nan vanankupavanai ninkal vanankupavarkal allar
unkalukku unkalutaiya markkam; enakku ennutaiya markkam
allahvutaiya utaviyum, verriyum varumpotum
melum, allahvin markkattil makkal aniyaniyakap piravecippatai ninkal kanum potum
Um'mutaiya iraivanin pukalaik kontu (tutittu) taspihu ceyviraka, melum avanitam pilai porukkat tetuviraka - niccayamaka avan"tavpavai" (pavamannippuk korutalai) erruk kolpavanaka irukkinran
apulahapin irantu kaikalum nacamataika, avanum nacamakattum
avanutaiya porulum, avan campatittavaiyum avanukkup payanpatavillai
viraivil avan koluntu vitteriyum neruppil pukuvan
viraku cumappavalana avanutaiya manaiviyo
avalutaiya kaluttil murukkeriya iccan kayirutan (atanal avalum alival)
(napiye!) Nir kuruviraka: Allah avan oruvane
allah (evaritattum) tevaiyarravan
avan (evaraiyum) peravumillai (evaralum) perappatavumillai
anriyum, avanukku nikaraka evarum illai
(napiye!) Nir colviraka: Atikalaiyin iraivanitattil nan kaval tetukiren
avan pataittavarrin tinkai vittum
irul paravum potu erpatum iravin tinkai vittum
innum, muticcukalil (mantirittu) utum penkalin tinkai vittum
poramaikkaran poramai kollum potuntakum tinkai vittum (kaval tetukiren)
(napiye!) Nir kuruviraka: Manitarkalin iraivanitattil nan kaval tetukiren
(avane) manitarkalin aracan
(avane) manitarkalin nayan
patunkiyiruntu vin cantekankalai untakkupavanin tinkai vittum (iraivanitattil nan kaval tetukiren)
avan manitarkalin itayankalil vin cantekankalai untakkukiran
(ittakaiyor) jinkalilum, manitarkalilum irukkinranar
